project.name: river
project.description: River-Internet is a project furthering the development and advancement of Jini technology.

target.name: river-runtime
target.description: results in complete river, without release archives

target.name: copy-resources
target.description: Copies various resources directories to the classes dir.

target.name: release
target.description: Create source and binary release packages

target.name: duplicate-text-files
target.description: Creates friendly txt versions of common files

target.name: jars
target.depends: river.jars, toolswrappers.jars, services.jars, extra.jar, groovy-config.jar, browser.jars

target.name: services.jars
target.depends: toolswrappers.jars, destroy.jar, fiddler.jar, fiddler-dl.jar, group.jar, group-dl.jar, mahalo.jar, mahalo-dl.jar, mercury.jar, mercury-dl.jar, norm.jar, norm-dl.jar, outrigger.jar, outrigger-dl.jar, outrigger-snaplogstore.jar, phoenix.jar, phoenix-dl.jar, phoenix-group.jar, phoenix-init.jar, reggie.jar, reggie-dl.jar, serviceui.jar, sharedvm.jar, start.jar

target.name: clean
target.description: Removes all files and dirs created by the build

target.name: clean-jars
target.description: Deletes the lib, lib-dl, and lib-ext directories.

target.name: toolswrappers.jars
target.depends: tools.jar, jarwrapper.jar, checkconfigurationfile.jar, checkser.jar, classdep.jar, classserver.jar, computedigest.jar, computehttpmdcodebase.jar, jsk-debug-policy.jar, preferredlistgen.jar, envcheck.jar

target.name: configentry
target.depends: prep, browser.configentry, destroy.configentry, fiddler-activatable.configentry, fiddler-persistent.configentry, fiddler-transient.configentry, JoinManager.configentry, LeaseRenewalManager.configentry, LookupDiscovery.configentry, LookupLocatorDiscovery.configentry, mahalo-activatable.configentry, mahalo-persistent.configentry, mahalo-transient.configentry, mercury-activatable.configentry, mercury-persistent.configentry, mercury-transient.configentry, norm-activatable.configentry, norm-persistent.configentry, norm-transient.configentry, outrigger-activatable.configentry, outrigger-persistent.configentry, outrigger-transient.configentry, phoenix.configentry, phoenix-group.configentry, phoenix-stop.configentry, reggie-activatable.configentry, reggie-persistent.configentry, reggie-transient.configentry, ServiceDiscoveryManager.configentry, sharedgroup.configentry, start.configentry, WakeupManager.configentry

target.name: all.doc
target.description: Generate javadoc for all, including subcomponents

target.name: all.jars
target.description: Generate JAR files for all, including subcomponents
